sen.j: 1952年、『祇園乙部』から名を改めた祇園東（後に祇園東と改める）の芸妓衆が上演したのが始まりといわれる。
sen.e: The origin of Gion odori is said to be the dance performances which were performed by the Gion geishas in 1952, soon after the district name was changed from Gion Otsubu to Gion Higashi-shinchi (subsequently renamed to Gion Higashi).
